attributes.action: I would like to see graphic health warnings on alcohol sales.
attributes.additional_details: Let's have an open and clear discussion in parliament including input from industry experts, health experts and recovered addicts.
attributes.background: I'm a recovering alcoholic who nearly killed himself and suffered liver damage through excessive drinking. The drinks industry now is in the same state ad the tobacco industry 50 years ago in that they do not need to publish health warnings on their products. I would like to see this changed.
